name: Warmth Thief
description: The Warmth Thief is a tiny fey creature embodying the essence of cold and stealth, capable of siphoning warmth and life force.
memorable: It drains warmth and life from its victims while being able to regain health from the damage dealt.
goals: To manipulate and harm those around it by draining warmth and life.
relations: It may be encountered with other fey creatures or cold-themed monsters.
environment: Primarily found in colder climates but struggles in warm environments.
strengths: Immune to cold damage and gains health from the cold damage it inflicts.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to warm environments, risking exhaustion from heat.
attacks: Uses freezing claws to deal slashing and cold damage, inflicting chilling effects on its targets.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Warmth Stealing allows it to deal cold damage and regain hit points from nearby foes.
senses: Possesses truesight to detect hidden foes within 60 feet.
skills: Excels in deception and stealth with +8 modifiers each.
additional_information: Uses cold damage in its attacks and abilities.
Can create new undead threats from slain humanoids.
Resistant to physical attacks from most nonmagical sources.
Maintains mobility through immunity to paralysis and prone condition.
Possesses a high Dexterity and Constitution for agility and durability.
test_queries: tiny fey creature that siphons warmth
cold-themed stealthy creature in colder climates
manipulative tiny monster that drains life
creature immune to cold with chilling attacks
fey creature that creates undead upon death
